location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to Captain G Walker, commanding the Honourable Company's Cruiser (HCC) Benaresand Senior Officer in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Asking him to communicate to all the vessels under his command the regulation that the amount of treasure freight received by all cruisers at Bushire should be paid into the treasury at the Residency, and accompanied by a return of the same.
